snippet: Republicans like John McCain won’t admit their primary role in next year’s forced defense cuts. Their theme seems to be: “It’s all the president’s fault!”
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republicans for blaming Pres Obama for the $500 billion across-the-board defense cut that begins in 2013 if budget deal is not reached; contends these same lawmakers were instrumental to crafting the budget deal that established the defense sequester in the event that a deficit reduction plan could not be agreed upon.
lead_paragraph: Republicans like John McCain won’t admit their primary role in next year’s forced defense cuts. Their theme seems to be: “It’s all the president’s fault!”
